Text: Can anyone confirm if this is virus-free and working?
It is most likely virus free - and working depends on what you mean. The game runs horribly on anything newer than XP. Crashes and poor performance in the main menu is common in Vista/7
Weren't GOG supposed to release DRM-free games that work both on older and newer versions of Windows? Still, it might explain the need for a separate software-rendering exe.
Works ok. No DRM, No virus.
I tryed another popular version and I had a few video problems with it. This one is easier to install, works great and there's no virus.

Simply does not work on Vista ... after trying everything under the sun, there is nothing but a black screen, and then a "Not Responsive" error ... as for the torrent itself: fast downloading speed, no viruses, and easy to install! +1
works perfectly on my netbook on windows 7. thanks!
Worked right after install, but get crash from time to time. Will try to google some more.
Thanks for the upload, bro! Really wanted to play this game.

Works good on my win7 64bit home edition. Only yjing is that it crash when I click the "ring" inside game, I think it is "review game.." somthing. No virus.
Fucking awesome game to play when u feel lazy ;D
This isn't pre-cracked. It says there's no disk in the drive.
